description: [``botocore``] This release adds support for C7i, and R7a instance types.
[``botocore``] This release adds the InstanceFamilies field to the ListAssets response.

[``botocore``] This release adds support for one-time model monitoring schedules that are executed immediately without delay, explicit data analysis windows for model monitoring schedules and exclude features attributes to remove features from model monitor analysis.
